item.title: CoreWeave 称英伟达云合同价值 63 亿美元
item.description: CoreWeave 公司表示，其股东 Nvidia 公司将购买初始价值为 63 亿美元的云服务。【原文：CoreWeave Inc. said its shareholder Nvidia Corp. will buy cloud services with an initial value of $6.3 billion.】

item.title: 美国股市上扬，交易商等待备受期待的降息
item.description: 美国股市周一早盘延续涨势，拉开了本周金融市场高风险的序幕，市场普遍预计美联储将重启降息周期。【原文：US equities extended gains early Monday to kick of a high-stakes week for financial markets, with the Federal Reserve largely expected to resume its interest-rate cutting cycle.】

item.title: 美国法官称 Orsted 支持的风电场应继续暂停运营
item.description: 特朗普政府要求法官驳回一家由 Orsted A/S 支持的风力发电厂企业提出的请求，允许其在质疑政府停工令的诉讼期间恢复施工，这可能关系到数十亿美元的投资和数百个工作岗位。【原文：The Trump administration asked a judge to deny a request by an Orsted A/S-backed wind farm venture to let it resume construction during a lawsuit challenging a government stop-work order, with potentially billions of dollars of investments and hundreds of jobs at stake.】

item.title: 摩根大通将削减旗舰新兴市场债券指数中的中国和印度份额
item.description: 摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：JPMorgan Chase & Co. will cut the weight of the largest bond issuers in its flagship emerging-market index, diverting investor flows from the likes of China and India toward smaller nations.】

item.title: 加纳中央银行行长称加纳通胀预期正在改善
item.description: 加纳银行行长约翰逊-阿西阿马（Johnson Asiama）在决策者开始为期三天的政策会议之际表示，西非国家的通胀预期正朝着正确的方向发展。【原文：Bank of Ghana Governor Johnson Asiama said inflation expectations in the West African nation are heading in the right direction, as policy makers began a three-day policy meeting.】

item.title: Snap 升级 AR 眼镜软件，明年面向消费者推出
item.description: Snap 公司正在推出用于增强现实眼镜的升级版操作系统，此举预示着该公司离明年推出首款消费级智能眼镜的日子越来越近了。【原文：Snap Inc. is rolling out an updated version of its operating system for augmented-reality glasses, a move that signals it’s getting closer to launching its first consumer smart glasses next year.】

item.title: Robinhood 计划推出面向零售业的私营公司基金
item.description: Robinhood Markets Inc. 将推出一只封闭式基金，为美国散户投资者提供接触私营公司的机会。【原文：Robinhood Markets Inc. is launching a closed-end fund to give US retail investors exposure to private companies.】

item.title: 加拿大工厂和批发商收益超预期
item.description: 加拿大受美国贸易战影响最大的两个行业在第三季度初的收益强于预期。【原文：Two of Canada’s most exposed sectors to the US trade war posted stronger-than-expected gains at the start of the third quarter.】

item.title: Conceivable 筹集 5000 万美元，将机器人试管婴儿胚胎实验室引入美国
item.description: Conceivable Life Sciences 公司制造了一种可以制造人类胚胎的机器人实验室，该公司筹集了 5000 万美元，用于帮助更多的体外受精诊所开发和推出其商业化技术，并计划于明年初在美国上市。【原文：Conceivable Life Sciences, which makes a robotic lab that can create human embryos, raised $50 million to help develop and launch its technology commercially at more in-vitro fertilization clinics with an aim to make it available in the US early next year.】

item.title: 巴西经济活动再次下滑，表明经济增长放缓
item.description: 巴西 7 月份的经济活动连续第三个月下滑，表明高昂的借贷成本正在对经济增长造成损害。【原文：Brazil’s economic activity dropped for third consecutive month in July, pointing to the toll that hefty borrowing costs are taking on growth.】

item.title: StanChart 的 SC Ventures 为 2.5 亿美元基金寻求投资者
item.description: 渣打银行（Standard Chartered Plc）的风险投资部门计划很快开始为一个 2.5 亿美元的基金筹集资金，该基金将专注于金融服务领域的数字资产投资。【原文：Standard Chartered Plc’s venture building arm plans to soon start raising capital for a $250 million fund focused on investments in digital assets in the financial services sector.】

item.title: 订单和出货量疲软，纽约工厂活动萎缩
item.description: 由于需求下滑，9 月份纽约州工厂活动的一项指标急剧下降，反映在新订单和装运量上。【原文：A measure of New York state factory activity fell sharply in September as demand slumped, reflected in faltering new orders and shipments.】

item.title: 阿拉斯加航空公司称季度利润受燃油成本和 IT 故障影响
item.description: 阿拉斯加航空集团（Alaska Air Group Inc.【原文：Alaska Air Group Inc.’s adjusted third-quarter profit will be at the low end of the carrier’s previous estimate of $1 to $1.40 a share, driven down by a July technology outage and rising fuel prices.】

item.title: 特朗普称公司应每六个月报告一次盈利情况
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普总统说，不应强迫公司按季度发布财报，他说他更喜欢六个月的时间表，认为这样可以节省企业的时间和金钱。【原文：President Donald Trump said companies should not be forced to deliver earnings reports on a quarterly basis, saying he preferred a six-month schedule he cast as saving businesses time and money.】

item.title: 安巴尼的信实集团通过资产支持证券融资 24 亿美元
item.description: 亿万富翁穆克什-安巴尼（Mukesh Ambani）的信实集团公司周一通过资产支持证券融资约 2100 亿卢比（24 亿美元），熟悉内情的人士称，这使其成为印度今年最大的此类交易之一。【原文：Billionaire Mukesh Ambani’s Reliance Group companies on Monday raised about 210 billion rupees ($2.4 billion) through asset-backed securities, people familiar with the matter said, making it one of the largest such deals in India this year.】

item.title: 印度 UCO 获准与受制裁的炼油厂 Nayara 合作
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，印度贷款机构 UCO 银行已获得政府批准，为纳亚拉能源有限公司（Nayara Energy Ltd.）的贸易支付提供便利。【原文：Indian lender UCO Bank has received government approval to facilitate trade payments for Nayara Energy Ltd., according to people familiar with the matter, nearly two months after the refiner was sanctioned by the EU and subsequently shunned by large financial institutions.】

item.title: 蹦床兔子和狗播客是娱乐业的未来吗？
item.description: 一个人的人工智能泔水就是另一个人的病毒式流行。【原文：One person’s AI slop is another’s viral hit.】

item.title: 瑞穗交易失败后，CVC正在洽谈收购KKR持有的Avendus股份
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，在瑞穗金融集团（Mizuho Financial Group Inc.【原文：CVC Capital Partners Plc has entered the race to acquire KKR & Co.’s majority stake in Avendus Capital Pvt. after Mizuho Financial Group Inc.’s attempts to buy out the Mumbai-based company stalled, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: MoonPay 收购支付初创公司，前 PayPal 和 Venmo 高管加盟
item.description: MoonPay 公司收购了加密货币支付初创公司 Meso Network，使这家数字资产公司在建立一个同时支持加密货币和法定货币的全球支付网络方面，将与 Circle Internet Group 公司和 Visa 公司等公司展开更直接的竞争。【原文：MoonPay Inc. acquired crypto payments startup Meso Network, putting the digital-asset firm on course to compete more directly with companies like Circle Internet Group Inc. and Visa Inc. in building a global payments network that supports both crypto and fiat currencies.】

item.title: 以色列亿万富翁祖克的银行将与客户平分收入
item.description: 一家由网络安全亿万富翁尼尔-祖克（Nir Zuk）联合创办的以色列数字银行将在明年开业时提出与储户平分利息收入，以期打入该国银行业。【原文：An Israeli digital bank co-founded by cybersecurity billionaire Nir Zuk will offer to split interest revenue with depositors when it opens next year in a bid to break into the country’s banking sector.】

item.title: 无人机袭击后俄罗斯普里莫尔斯克港恢复石油装载
item.description: 至少有两艘油轮在俄罗斯的普里莫尔斯克港完成了装货，这表明在乌克兰周五对该港口发动无人机袭击之后，这个波罗的海港口已经恢复了运营。【原文：At least two tankers have completed loadings at Russia’s Primorsk, showing that the Baltic Sea port has resumed operations in the aftermath of Friday’s drone attacks on the facility by Ukraine.】

item.title: 欧洲央行施纳贝尔支持在通胀上行风险中保持利率稳定
item.description: 欧洲中央银行执行董事会成员伊莎贝尔-施纳贝尔（Isabel Schnabel）认为，欧洲中央银行应维持目前的利率水平，并将物价上涨的危险向上移。【原文：The European Central Bank should maintain its current level of interest rates, with dangers to prices tilted to the upside, according to Executive Board member Isabel Schnabel.】

item.title: 监管机构呼吁欧盟在加密货币监管方面加强协调
item.description: 法国、奥地利和意大利的金融监管机构在发现加密货币法规的执行方式存在差异后，敦促欧盟最高市场监督机构开始直接监督主要的加密货币公司，并收紧该集团的规则。【原文：Financial regulators in France, Austria and Italy urged the European Union’s top markets watchdog to start supervising major crypto companies directly and tighten the bloc’s rules, after identifying disparities in how crypto regulations are being implemented.】

item.title: 因供应担忧，咖啡自四月以来首次突破 4 美元
item.description: 由于对供应紧张和贸易紧张局势的担忧挥之不去，纽约咖啡期货延续涨势，自 4 月份以来首次突破每磅 4 美元。【原文：Coffee futures extended a rally in New York, exceeding $4 a pound for the first time since April, on lingering worries about tight supplies and trade tensions.】

item.title: MEG 董事会拒绝了亿万富翁沃特乌斯的斯特拉斯科纳公司更丰厚的出价
item.description: MEG Energy Corp. 董事会拒绝了 Strathcona Resources Ltd. 提出的收购这家油砂生产商的甜美报价，建议股东们坚持 Cenovus Energy Inc.【原文：MEG Energy Corp.’s board turned down Strathcona Resources Ltd.’s sweetened offer to buy the oil sands producer, recommending that shareholders stick with a rival offer from Cenovus Energy Inc.】

item.title: T.T Rowe Price推出由沃尔玛继承人支持的蓝色债券基金
item.description: T.罗尔-普莱斯集团（T Rowe Price Group Inc.【原文：T. Rowe Price Group Inc. has secured financing from Walmart Inc. heir Lukas Walton’s impact platform for a new corporate bond fund, which will support investments in themes including water security and marine protection in emerging markets.】

item.title: Orsted 首席财务官称定价反应平淡是股票出售的好兆头
item.description: Orsted A/S 的首席财务官 Trond Westlie 表示，市场对这家风力发电公司 94 亿美元的供股定价反应平淡，这对股票销售来说是一个积极的信号。【原文：Orsted A/S’s Chief Financial Officer Trond Westlie said the muted market reaction to the pricing of the wind power firm’s $9.4 billion rights offering was a positive sign for the share sale.】

item.title: 墨西哥向市场出售三部分欧洲债券为墨西哥石油公司提供资金
item.description: 墨西哥正在寻求出售欧元债券，这是它为支持负债累累的国有石油公司墨西哥石油公司（Petroleos Mexicanos）而采取的最新举措。【原文：Mexico is looking to sell eurobonds, the latest step in its campaign to support the debt-laden state-owned oil company Petroleos Mexicanos.】

item.title: 南非电力削减减少，OUTsurance 盈利大增
item.description: 由于南非停电事故明显减少，索赔减少，帮助将利润提高到三年来的最高点，OUTsurance Group Ltd. 的涨幅达到一年来最大。【原文：OUTsurance Group Ltd. rose the most in a year as a marked decline in South African power cuts reduced claims and helped lift profit to a three-year high.】

item.title: 纽约被撤销的核电厂或将获得缓刑
item.description:
随着清洁电力需求的膨胀，印度发电站的所有者并不排除重启的可能性。【原文：

Indian Point’s owner is not ruling out a restart as demand for clean power balloons.

】
